name: Axis Descending
storyline: In a world shattered by a cataclysmic event, the planet's continents are now floating chunks of land that constantly shift around the core. Considered the "Nexus", the core holds the world together and contains an invaluable source of energy: Undum Ore. You play as Axis Kailash, a weathered sky pirate captain and leader of the only rebellion fighting against a league of immortal warriors called The Eversoul Continuum.
summary: Axis Descending is a Metroidvania Souls-like where you dodge, slash and shock your way through an expansive platforming world, encounter individually unique NPCs, traverse environments without a map and upgrade your character via horizontal progression.
